titleInfo.title: Luncheon Party of Council of Jewish Women

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 4 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Jan 29 - 1914, #430, Luncheon party of Council of Jewish Women; Top L Rita Silversmith, Jessie Lewin, Amy Mayer; Bottom 2nd, Flossie Schradsky Frankel, Elsie Lewin Stern; bottom, Bella Lewin Morse.''

mods.abstract: Collage of photographs of women from a luncheon of the Council of Jewish Women. Top left to right Rita Silversmith, Jessie Lewin, and Amy Mayer; middle row left to right Flossie Schradsky Frankel and Elsie Lewin Stern; Bottom Bella Lewin Morse.''

name.namePart: National Council of Jewish Women.--Denver Section

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
